title: Personal Information
description: Complete your personal details and contact information
instructions: Please provide accurate personal information and upload required documents.

title: Emergency Contacts
description: Add emergency contact information for safety purposes
instructions: Provide at least two emergency contacts with their relationship to you.

title: Banking Information
description: Setup direct deposit and banking details
instructions: Upload a recent bank statement or void check for direct deposit setup.

title: IT Setup
description: Configure your work accounts and access permissions
instructions: IT department will assist with account setup and equipment assignment.

title: Orientation Meeting
instructions: Schedule and attend your orientation meeting with HR.
